it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.gionnino9000.clients

Class Tavoletta

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.client.TablutClient
      • it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.gionnino9000.clients.Tavoletta
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Tavoletta
extends TablutClient
    Tavoletta is the client of our player for the AI Tablut Challenge 2022. We know you're reading this, you're free to "copy" it, just don't make it too obvious.
    You can find the complete source code of the project here.
    See Also:
    this for the name explaination, even though we hope you don't need it. If you do and still don't get it, just know that we hate you.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tavoletta

        public Tavoletta(java.lang.String player,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 int timeout,
                 java.lang.String ipAddress,
                 int game,
                 boolean debug)
          throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Main constructor
        Parameters:
        player - the side the player plays for [WHITE | BLACK]
        name - the name of the team
        timeout - the maximum number of seconds the player has to choose its next move
        ipAddress - the server address
        game - the game rules [1 - BasicTablut | 2 - ModernTablut | 3 - BrandubTablut | 4 - AshtonTablut]
        debug - enable debug prints (show the depth of the search and information about the expanded nodes)
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the IP address of the host could not be determined.
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the socket.
